name: wise-glasses
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s special moves by 10%.
short_effect: Held: Boosts the damage of special moves used by the holder by 1/10 (10%).

flavor_text.black-white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a thick pair of glasses that slightly boosts the power of special moves.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a thick pair of glasses that slightly boosts the power of special moves.
